title: Land for sale in Colombo - 06
details:
Facing Stratford Road with about 75 feet road frontage

Land extant 16.7

Property has a 2 storied house with 5 bed room & 3 Bath room, Car Parking, hall, dining area, Pantry, & 6.5 perch garden space

Since it faces the main road it is highly recommended for commercial projects such as Apartments, Supermarkets, Restaurants, retail & whole sale businesses, clothing shops or for any mix development project

200 mtrs radius to both Kirulapone Road & Pamankada Junction

Price Rs. 8 Million per perch (negotiable)

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD , (next to mahanama college )
COLOMBO 03
